bibl.title: Periergia: Egyptian Reactions to Greek Curiosity.

series.title: Oriens et Occidens. Studien zu antiken Kulturkontakten und ihrem Nachleben.

bibl.note: Shows how the Egyptians might have perceived the Greek interest in their culture.

bibl.title: Cultural Borrowings and Ethnic Appropriations in Antiquity

bibl.seg: ASSMANN Jan, Periergia: Egyptian Reactions to Greek Curiosity.
Erich S. GRUEN (Ed.), Cultural Borrowings and Ethnic Appropriations in Antiquity = Oriens et Occidens. Studien zu antiken Kulturkontakten und ihrem Nachleben. 8 (Stuttgart, 2005) pp. 37-49.
Shows how the Egyptians might have perceived the Greek interest in their culture.
